entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
